Definitely! Austrian beer and wine are both great options to pair with traditional Austrian cuisine. Here are some recommendations for where to find them in Graz:

1. Gasthaus Zum Lindenhof - This restaurant has a good selection of local and regional wines, as well as Austrian beer such as Gösser and Ottakringer. 2. Restaurant Augarten - This restaurant offers a wide selection of Austrian wines, including several from Styria, as well as beer from local breweries such as Brauerei Puntigam. 3. Restaurant Der Steirer - This restaurant has a large selection of local and regional wines, including many from Styria. They also offer several Austrian beers, including Stiegl and Schladminger. 4. Gasthaus Puntigam - This restaurant serves beer from the local Brauerei Puntigam, as well as several other Austrian beer brands. 5. Zum Guten Hirten - This restaurant has an extensive wine list featuring many Austrian wines, as well as a selection of Austrian beers including Schleppe and Hirter. I hope this helps and enjoy your meal with a great drink in Graz!
